movie-description: Kana tries to end her starring role in an abusive porno. For her, the end comes only after she's been reduced to a "Tumbling Doll of Flesh".
movie-short-description: Directed by Tamakichi Anaru.  With Kanako Ooba, Kikurin, Tamakichi Anaru, Yuuji Kitano. Kana tries to end her starring role in an abusive porno. For her, the end comes only after she's been reduced to a "Tumbling Doll of Flesh".
